alert.note: Alert for Bakersfield; Buena Vista; Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Coalinga - Avenal; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; Fresno-Clovis; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota; Planada - Le Grand - Snelling; South End San Joaquin Valley; Southeast San Joaquin Valley; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley; West Side Mountains South of 198; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 14 at 6:06PM PST until January 15 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Widespread visibilities in dense fog below 800 feet with some locations below 200 feet. * WHERE...Most of the San Joaquin Valley. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening until noon PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways affected include, but are not limited to Highway 198, Highway 41, Highway 43, Highway 180, Highway 152, Highway 99, and Kern County portions of Interstate 5.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your low beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Plan on travel delays and allow extra time to reach your destination.
